availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Fletcher Donaldson (Bath County, KY, petitioner)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Bath County native. Married to Nancy Harper Donaldson. Father of Richard Donaldson, John Donaldson, George A. Donaldson, James Donaldson, and Fletcher Donaldson. Farmer in Bath County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Employed Mary Ralls as a domestic servant and Allen Steele as a farmhand in Bath County in 1860. Resident in Bath County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, District 1, p. 57B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 20.
